In first step , 25 CF patient interview : approximately 15 CF patient experience least one episode exacerbation past year approximately CF 10 patient currently experience exacerbation . The latter group interview 3 time antibiotic treatment . The instrument initial item list develop basis interview . Up five health professional rate item ' relevance . In step , item ' clarity relevance assess cognitive debriefing interview 10 patient . In last step ( part III ) , instrument 's preliminary construct concurrent validity reliability test large sample 150 patient experience exacerbation . Patients ask complete newly develop questionnaire set questionnaire one time point . For part III , ethic approval ask late date ( 2015 ) .
